subject: Shipping
description_text:
Good morning
I made an order on the 30th and I haven’t got an update that it has shipped yet. My order number is SSN4210. I was just checking in too make sure it wasn’t lost or something. 
Thank you, 
                      Jason Goosby
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 7906 中
